name: ARGeoTrackingStatus.StateReason
desc: The reasons for the app's geotracking status.

items.name: case needLocationPermissions
items.desc: The location requires user permission for geotracking.

items.name: case devicePointedTooLow
items.desc: The position of the device is too low for geotracking.

items.name: case worldTrackingUnstable
items.desc: The position or motion of the device makes geotracking unstable.

items.name: case waitingForLocation
items.desc: A state in which the framework performs a check for the user's GPS position.

items.name: case waitingForAvailabilityCheck
items.desc: A state in which the framework performs a check for geotracking availability at the user's location.

items.name: case geoDataNotLoaded
items.desc: A state in which the framework downloads localization imagery.

items.name: case visualLocalizationFailed
items.desc: Localization imagery failed to match the view from the device's camera.
